Verses: 1 seeyoninimiththamum Erusaleminimiththamum Naan Mavunamaayiraamalum, Adhin Needhi Pragaasaththaippolavum, Adhin Ratchippu Erigira Theevattiyaippolavum Velippadumattum Amaraamalum Iruppen.
2 jaadhigal Un Needhiyaiyum, Sagala Raajaakkalum Un Magimaiyaiyum Kaanbaargal; Karththarudaiya Vaai Sollum Pudhu Naamaththaal Nee Azhaikkappaduvaai.
3 nee Karththarudaiya Kaiyil Alangaaramaana Kreedamum, Un Dhevanudaiya Karaththil Raajamudiyumaayiruppaai.

4 nee Inik Kaividappattaval Ennappadaamalum, Un Dhesam Inip Paazhaana Dhesamennappadaamalum, Nee Epsibaa Endrum, Un Dhesam Piyoolaa Endrum Sollappadum; Karththar Unmel Piriyamaayirukkiraar; Un Dhesam Vaazhkkaippadum.
5 vaaliban Kannigaiyai Vivaagampannuvadhupola, Un Makkal Unnai Vivaagampannuvaargal; Manavaalan Manavaattiyinmel Magizhchchiyaayiruppadhupola, Un Dhevan Unmel Magizhchchiyaayiruppaar.

6 erusaleme, Un Madhilgalinmel Pagalmuzhudhum, Raamuzhudhum Orukkaalum Mavunamaayiraadha Jaamakkaararaik Kattalaiyidugiren. Karththaraip Prasthaabampannugiravargale, Neengal Amarikkaiyaayirukkalaagaadhu.
7 avar Erusalemai Sthirappaduththi, Boomiyile Adhaip Pugazhchchiyaakkumvaraikkum Avarai Amarndhirukkavidaadhirungal.

8 ini Naan Un Dhaaniyaththai Un Saththurukkalukku Aagaaramaagakkoden; Un Prayaasaththinaalaagiya Un Dhraatcharasaththai Anniya Puththirar Kudippadhumillaiyendru Karththar Thamadhu Valadhukaraththinmelum Thamadhu Vallamaiyulla Buyaththinmelum Aanaiyittaar.
9 adhai Serththavargale Adhaip Pusiththuk Karththaraith Thudhippaargal; Adhaik Koottivaiththavargale En Parisuththa Sthalaththin Praagaarangalil Adhaik Kudippaargal.

10 vaasalgal Vazhiyaaip Pravesiyungal, Pravesiyungal; Janaththukku Vazhiyai Sevvaippaduththungal, Paadhaiyai Uyarththungal, Uyarththungal; Adhilulla Karkalaip Porukkippodungal; Janangalukkaagak Kodiyai Etrungal.

11 neengal Seeyon Kumaaraththiyai Nokki: Idho Un Ratchippu Varugiradhu, Idho, Avar Arulum Balan Avarodum, Avar Seyyum Pradhipalan Avar Munbaagavum Varugiradhu Endru Sollungal Endru, Karththar Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharam Varaikkum Koorugiraar.
12 avargalaip Parisuththa Janamendrum, Karththaraal Meetkappattavargalendrum Solluvaargal; Nee Thedikkollappattadhendrum, Kaividappadaadha Nagaramendrum Peyarperuvaai.
